nodes.title: Fixed a bunch of lint issues
Fix some issues with 'light and dark' theme.
Allow opening, closing and merging pull requests.
Add xxhdpi icon and refresh icons to be a higher quality
Add 'Clone' menu option to the Repository viewer activity
Mark repository as read when marking last unread notification
Auto-capitalize text in issue title input field
Scroll to first unread comment when coming from notification
Add shortcuts to enter labels and milestone management screens
Improve appearance of labels and assignees in issue edit activity
Make bookmark action work as toggle
Add open in browser action for repository and user
Change title of search action in repository activity
Prevent right side drawer from opening during fast scroll
Handle direct links to file line comments
Only open blog list activity if not linking directly to article
Add option to view pull request branches
Fix off by one error for organization selection
Fix login not working if activity gets killed
Fix new issue not appearing in list after creation
Switch to correct pull request tab if it was linked directly
[WIP] Direct link to file/line in commits and pull requests
Removed the invalid drone.io links from README
Add scrollbars to screens with scrollable content
Add indicator showing when commits have description
Display closed milestones in milestone list
Fix title of pull request edit screen
Navigate to correct parent from issue edit screen
Navigate to milestones list when going up from edit milestone
Fix incorrect button text in issue close dialog
Add search action to repository screen
Display confirmation dialog when closing/reopening issue
Fix toolbar collapsing when there are no items
Fix initial item highlight in navigation drawer
Display icon for merged pull requests
Change icon for right-side menu to horizontal dots
Add action to open issue/pull request in browser
Fix comment send button being enabled when text is empty
Do not animate drawer toggle icon
Fix pull reqest events mentioning "Issue" instead of "Pull request"
Display no description text for pull requests and issues without one
Restore original label properties when cancelling label edit
Fix repository name overlaping issue info in issue view
Add missing click highlights to clickable elements
Added icons for the main drawer, updated version
Added icons for the main drawer
fixed line breaks on release notes using newline characters
Fix NPE in IssueListActivity when not authorized
Add year and name of copyright owner
Annoying notification about push access when viewing repositories.
Convert more activities to derive from WebViewerActivity.
Some fixes for Bugsense reported bugs
When opening commit list or tree links, go to the respective page.
Added drone.io debug build to downloads
Some initial cleanup & UX improvements for commit comment code
Properly center both label and number and simplify layout.
Fixed issue in displaying Pull Request Number
Pressing back after submitting an issue shouldn't return to New Issue screen #149
Refreshing an issue should not make content duplicated #174
Fixed Lint Issues, Removed unused code/files
Imrpoved Code/Markdown display according to theme
Added Pull Request Numbers to Repository Fragment
Use OkHttp to avoid connection issues in some android versions #181
Add bio to user/organization profile screen
Fix TransactionTooLargeException when opening a diff with lots of comments
Show dates for commits older than 1 week in commit list
Fix poor green text/icon contrast on dark theme
Fix "Follow" action being displayed instead of "Unfollow" in followers list
Minor releases list improvements and fix
Avoid an unnecessary API call to load formatted Release body
Fix crash when start/completion dates are null in completed check runs
Fix size of private repo/gist icon in list
Fix crash when a PR review is made by a deleted user
Fix inability to find installed browser on Android 11
Add details for F-Droid app page
Opt-out from WebView usage statistics collection
Provide content assists for sharing URLs
Hide explore section if logged in
Add source code link in about & move settings to the left
Initialize work manager on demand to fix tests
Update code-prettify and Fix Rust and Kotlin Syntax Highlighting
Prevent white splash on cold start
Use in-screen bottom sheet for review replies
Display author association next to username
Move starred repositories to bookmarks screen
Improved about screens of profiles and repositories
Move watched repositories to Notifications screen
Use code viewer text size setting for diff view in review.
Right align icon to save vertical space
Hard-Coded bundle params + few extra strings removed #714
Implement multiple tasks feature for issues
When editing issue only update changed properties
Refreshing issues while in search mode clears input #686
Change order of issue properties in edit screen
Extract BrowseFilter load tasks to new package
Fix crash when reactions update after leaving activity
Ability to delete branch after merge of PR
Add open in browser action to release list and release info screens
Add a way to view raw content of markdown files
Fix search expanded state being restored incorrectly
Directly open and highlight comment from news feed
Add utility method for sharing links
Fix being unable to open repo when clicking on attributes
Add loading of all and participating notifications
Fix icon in README and add myself as contributor
Make links in commit messages clickable
Render emoji using separate library where necessary
Handle organization links and user link tab query parameter
Make code search results scroll to matching fragments
Introduce flavors and api key abstraction for F-Droid [F-Droid 3/4]
